subject: fix: improve notification icon clarity and state detection
body:
- Change notification icons for better UX:
  - Enabled: Use üîî bell instead of ‚úÖ tick
  - Undetermined: Use ‚è≥ hourglass instead of üîî bell
  - This makes states clearer: hourglass = waiting/unknown, bell = enabled, bell-slash = disabled

- Fix permission state detection on first load:
  - Add useEffect that rechecks permission once OneSignal SDK becomes ready
  - Ensures icon updates from hourglass to actual state without user interaction
  - Prevents stuck "undetermined" state on page load

- Improve browser detection for Chromium browsers:
  - Detect Chrome, Brave, and other Chromium browsers as 'Chrome/Brave'
  - Update notification instructions to be more generic for all Chromium browsers
  - Removes confusion when Brave users see "Chrome" in instructions
title: improve notification icon clarity and state detection
